thread.title: NADRA Director General arrested by FIA
thread.title_full: NADRA Director General arrested by FIA

title: NADRA Director General arrested by FIA
text:
Director General NADRA arrested by FIA | 0 0 
ISLAMABAD: Director General National Database and Regulatory Authority (NADRA) Tahir Akram has been arrested by the Federal Investigation Agency (FIA). 
The NADRA chief has been accused of corruption while renting buildings for the organization. 
According to the FIA the NADRA chief has caused a loss of Rs30 million to the public exchequer. 0 0 Director General NADRA arrested by FIA   Corruption In Pakistan, Federal Investigation Agency, Fia, Nadra, Tahir Akram.   "Director General NADRA arrested by FIA" is https://www.geo.tv/latest/132131-NADRA-Director-General-arrested-by-FIA+geo%2FGiKR+%28Geo+Pakistan+-
